claim_card.claim: The Gaussian synthetic control cohort is a deliberately strong null: it is power-spectrum-matched to the mean-field-corrected observed reconstruction ((dat-mf) spectrum) while removing higher-order/non-Gaussian morphological organization.
claim_card.test_hook: Inspect control construction steps and regenerate Gaussian controls from the cleaned harmonic field spectrum; confirm matching at the two-point level while using zero mean field for synthetic runs.

source.note: Gaussian synthetic control construction from phi_clean and C_l estimate
